name: Ticking Time Ball
description:
This game is simple...don't run out of time.  Collect yellow Time Boost power-ups to keep yourself alive as long as possible while simultaneously avoiding obstacles.  Getting hit by one is an instant GAME OVER but collecting the Shield Power-up allows you to survive one enemy hit when it is active.  Speaking of the Shield Power-up, press the "W" key while your shield is active to trade it out for a few precious seconds added to your timer.  This is only possible if you have an active shield and 2 seconds or less remain on your game timer.  Good luck! 

IMPORTANT:  If not in Full Screen Mode, the left and right edges are cut off.  You can still play but you will lose visibility to about 10 percent of the screen.
